Customer Stories

Discover how leading pharmaceutical, biotech, and medical device companies are transforming their validation processes with GoVal's digital solutions.

Featured Case Studies

Real-world implementations demonstrating measurable results and compliance success.

Global Generic Pharmaceutical Company

India-based multinational pharmaceutical manufacturer

500+ Employees 15+ Countries Generic Drugs

The Challenge

The company was struggling with paper-based validation processes that were time-consuming, error-prone, and difficult to maintain compliance across multiple manufacturing sites globally. Manual documentation was creating bottlenecks in production timelines.

GoVal Solution

Implemented comprehensive paperless validation system across all manufacturing sites, including automated GxP assessments, digital workflows, and real-time compliance monitoring with centralized reporting capabilities.

75%
Faster Validation
100%
Paperless Process
60%
Cost Reduction
99.9%
Compliance Rate
"GoVal has transformed our validation processes completely. We've achieved 100% paperless validation across all our sites and reduced validation timelines by 75%. The real-time compliance monitoring has been game-changing for our audit readiness."
Dr. Rajesh Kumar
Head of Quality Assurance

Middle East Quality Consulting

KSA-based quality consulting company

Healthcare Focus Food Industries Global Team

The Challenge

A KSA-based quality consulting company needed to implement automated validation and maintenance activities for their pharmaceutical clients, including equipment validation and data capture using IoT devices.

GoVal Solution

Deployed GoVal's Equipment Logbook solution with IoT integration for automated data capture, real-time monitoring, and comprehensive validation management for equipment and processes.

90%
Automation Level
24/7
IoT Monitoring
85%
Time Savings
"The IoT integration with GoVal has revolutionized how we monitor and validate equipment for our clients. Real-time data capture and automated reporting have significantly improved our service quality."
Ahmed Al-Mansouri
Senior Quality Consultant
